summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's Purple Ginseng Cleansing Balm is formulated with purple ginseng, plant-based esters and a nourishing blend of linoleic-rich oils that help to dissolve makeup, oil, sunscreen and other impurities.
details: DetailsBenefitsA sorbet-like cleansing balm that melts into skinDissolves dirt, oil, makeup, sunscreen and other impuritiesEmulsifies upon contactDermatologist testedFragrance freeVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeaturesSorbet-like balm-to-oil formula contains linoleic-rich oils that work to dissolve makeup, oil, sunscreen, and other impurities, plus rinses clean. Great as a first cleanse or as your only cleanseDeveloped for all skin typesFormulated with purple ginseng, plant-based esters and a nourishing blend of linoleic-rich oilsDoes not contain any PEGs or polyethyleneKey IngredientsEmulsifiers rich with Fatty Acids & Linoleic Oils: leaves skin feeling silky smooth and velvety-soft, promotes a conditioned and supple skin barrier, leaving skin feeling moisturized, not greasy or oily; leaves skin feeling conditioned, nourished and cleansed.Neem Leaf & Flower Extract: potent antioxidant, rich in flavanoids and polyphenolsRed Algae Extract: contains natural minerals, including magnesium and zinc, helps soothe dry skinAloe Flower Extract: powerful skin conditioner with humectant propertiesItem 2627357How To UseUsing dry hands, work a generous amount of the cleansing balm onto dry skin and add water to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with second cleanse. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Synthetic Wax, Polyglyceryl-10 Dioleate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Isoamyl Cocoate, Glyceryl Citrate/Lactate/Linoleate/Oleate, Polygonum Bistorta Root Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Glyceryl Laurate, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Aqua, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-4 Cocoate, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Alcohol, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Using dry hands, work a generous amount of the cleansing balm onto dry skin and add water to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly and follow with second cleanse. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: TERRIBLE FOMULA CHANGE
reviews.comments: Used to be my holy grail. But since this year formula change... I hate it it. The only way to get the residue off is with bar soap. The new formula has cause clogged pores and breakouts.

reviews.headline: Clogged pores
reviews.comments: First this leaves a film on the skin that does not rinse away. After a second wash with a cleanser my skin still feels like its not completely gone. After about a week of use i now have clogged pores and blackheads on my chin and nose. Its a shame because ive loved everything else by this brand but this is a big miss. Ill stick with Farmacy

reviews.headline: My sister and I Love it
reviews.comments: I tried it out when it first came out and it does the job of removinf hard make up, suncreen, eyeliner, mascara. It works better with a double cleanse but overall for the price and how much you are getting its a really good cleansing balm compared to others with the same price range and amount. My sister tried it out when it got to ulta and it still works the same. If you dont wanna splirge but need something to help remove your waterresistant stuff this will work!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've bought a lot of cleansing balms over the past few years, and I have to say that the Purple Ginseng Cleansing Balm is one of the best that I've tried. The texture feels so luxurious, and it melts my face off at the end of the day in the most wonderful way possible. The way my skin feels absolutely drives me crazy because of how smooth and soft it feels after using it.

Another thing I'd like to highlight is that I feel that my skin is now working better with my skincare products. I was using the same exact products before and after; the only thing that changed in my skincare routine was switching out my old cleansing balm for this one, and the difference after a few weeks makes me wish that I had picked up this product sooner.

One of the reasons why I waited to use this product was that I bought other cleansing balms for cheaper, and I had assumed since they did the same thing, I could easily invest in less expensive products and still achieve the same result. However, one of the first things I noticed when opening the packaging was how much product there actually was in the component. Along with the fact that it's outperforming my other cleansing balms, I have to say that getting this cleansing balm is such a steal. I almost feel you're getting MORE than your money's worth with this product.

Coming from a girl who has struggled with acne for years, I highly recommend this product. It's such a great investment, and I am definitely buying again after I run out of this one, which might take me a while since there is so much of it. I hope you find this review helpful and that once you try it, you also find the same results and feel the same joy I did.
faceoff_positive.headline: You're going to want and need this-

faceoff_negative.comments: I was sooo excited for this to come out, since Susan Yara is all about cleansing balms and I figured she would make an amazing version. But no, this is a fail in my book. Agree with other reviewers, this does not emulsify nicely and leaves a waxy residue on my face every single time, regardless of how much I work it in, use different temp water. I had to use a physical exfoliant for my second cleanse every time just to get the waxy film off of my face. I gave it away and told the person they could toss it if they don't like it. So disappointing! Please try again.
